CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many stages are there in this funnel chart?

SRP.Q: Is the Filtered by Quality Inspection stage positioned above or below the Purchased by Consumers stage?
SRP.A: The Filtered by Quality Inspection stage is positioned {above} the Purchased by Consumers stage.

VPR.Q: What pattern does the data reduction follow in this funnel chart?
VPR.A: The data reduction follows a {logarithmic} pattern.

VE.Q: What is the value of stage Filtered by Quality Inspection?
VE.A: The value of stage Filtered by Quality Inspection is {10952}.

VE.Q: What is the value of stage Packaged for Distribution?
VE.A: The value of stage Packaged for Distribution is {5476}.

VE.Q: What is the value of stage Purchased by Consumers?
VE.A: The value of stage Purchased by Consumers is {1826}.

EVJ.Q: What is the maximum value in the funnel chart?
EVJ.A: The stage with the highest value is Filtered by Quality Inspection, with a value of {10952}.

EVJ.Q: What is the minimum value in the funnel chart?
EVJ.A: The stage with the lowest value is Purchased by Consumers, with a value of {1826}.

SC.Q: How much did it decrease from stage Filtered by Quality Inspection to stage Packaged for Distribution?
SC.A: Decreased by {5476} Tons from stage Filtered by Quality Inspection to stage Packaged for Distribution.

NF.Q: In which stages of the funnel chart does the value exceed 8214? Please list the stage labels and corresponding values.
NF.A: The {Filtered by Quality Inspection} stage has {10952}.

NF.Q: In which stages of the funnel chart does the value fall below 2049? Please list the stage labels and corresponding values.
In which stages of the funnel chart does the value fall between 2049 and 8214? Please list the stage labels and corresponding values.
NF.A: The {Packaged for Distribution} stage has {5476}, the {Delivered to Retail} stage has {2272}.

NC.Q: Which reduction is greater: from stage Packaged for Distribution to Delivered to Retail, or from stage Delivered to Retail to Purchased by Consumers?
NC.A: The reduction from stage {Packaged for Distribution} to {Delivered to Retail} is greater.

NC.Q: Which reduction is the greatest: from stage Filtered by Quality Inspection to Packaged for Distribution, from stage Delivered to Retail to Purchased by Consumers, or from stage Packaged for Distribution to Delivered to Retail?
NC.A: The reduction from stage {Filtered by Quality Inspection} to stage {Packaged for Distribution} is the greatest.

MSR.Q: Between which two consecutive stages in the funnel chart is the conversion rate drop the largest?
MSR.A: The largest drop in conversion rate occurs between the {Filtered by Quality Inspection} and {Packaged for Distribution} stages.

MSR.Q: Between which two consecutive stages in the funnel chart is the conversion rate drop the smallest?
MSR.A: The smallest drop in conversion rate occurs between the {Delivered to Retail} and {Purchased by Consumers} stages.
